items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, fits beautifully, great color.
items.body: Elegant, drapes well on the body, flirtatious. It gives one feel good and confident feeling. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great birthday outfit
items.body: Really cute, flowy sleeves and dress made it comfortable and soft/silky material w velvet floral detail helped stand out. Length came to mid thigh Read more
items.author: Jennifer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but long
items.body: The dress is SO CUTE and very comfortable. The dress was really long though, so I did chop off about 2 inches. What was specifically long was the overlay, there was an awkward amount of fabric showing since the slip underneath was a solid color and shorter. The fabric is really forgiving, hid the choppy scissor cuts very well. Would absolutely purchase again, but probably in a smaller size to help with the length. I am 5’1, so keep that in mind :) Read more
items.author: Chloe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty
items.body: So pretty fits like a glove…meaning perfect true to size. Read more
items.author: Kimberly Gullett

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars N/A
items.body: Dress to long for me Read more
items.author: Rosario

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don’t get this dress if you’re tall.
items.body: Very cute dress, but only for short people. I am 5’8, 150lbs and ordered a M. The dress was exactly what I was looking for, but the skirt was way too short. It was already riding up walking over to the mirror, I can’t imagine flashing all my family and friends during our Christmas party… will be returning unfortunately. If you’re shorter, definitely get this dress! The quality felt good with 2 layers, and it was definitely super cute and flattering! Read more
items.author: Emily ten Hoopen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Cute, Easy Dress for Any Event
items.body: I bought this for a last-minute event, and it saved me. The fit is flattering, the fabric is soft with a bit of bounce, and the pattern looks feminine without being too busy. The sleeves sit nicely on the shoulders, and the cinching gives a nice shape at the waist. It’s comfortable enough to wear for hours, and it moves beautifully when you walk. Definitely one of those “looks more expensive than it was” finds. Read more
items.author: Myunique Green

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars buy the dress girl
items.body: decent quality, super comfortable and cute. i got a medium in the color black. i’m a size 12 and it fits perfectly. the quality doesn’t seem worth $45 necessarily but i like it alot anyway. recommend!! Read more
items.author: skye

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral Black, Floral Wine Red, Floral White, Floral Pink, Floral Wine Red Black, Floral Army Green, Floral Black Black, Floral Blue, Floral Green, Floral Grey Blue, Floral Blue Green, Floral Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
